long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Motivation is a driving force that influences how and why we do things. It is the desire to achieve a goal or outcome, and can be either intrinsic (coming from within) or extrinsic (coming from external sources). Motivation is important in guiding behavior and creating lasting changes in behavior. You have the world at your finger tips and a boost of motivation on every new tab provided by curated royalty free images. Learn more about us at: https://3bluemedia.com/3b-motivate.html

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the 3B Auto Inspiration extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://3bluemedia.com/terms.html and Privacy Policy at https://3bluemedia.com/3blue-moativate-privacy-policy.html. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab and it will be provided by Microsoft Bing.
